content.detailedDescription: Talk to someone
content.summary: Talk to someone

content.detailedDescription:
Objects appeared over the ocean and hovered approximately 3-4 minutes, glowing as attached video indicates.  there were 2 craft that then disappeared after filming stopped.  we live in vero beach florida approximately 60 miles south of the cape canaveral launch site. when my wife kathy observed the lights she then grabbed her hd camera and filmed  the attached video.

both  yesterday before the sighting and today after the sighting, military helicopters were scene several times going up and down the beach area, while seen occasionally in our area behind our house traveling the coast line, they are rare, particularly two days in a row.

the 2 square/diamond shape items appeared above the water, hovered in tandem for 3-4 minutes during which time the attached film was taken and then disappeared.
content.summary: Appeared behind  our house over the ocean, hovered then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
1. approx 10 p.M. about 50 - 60 miles west of chicago in the middle of farm land. driving home from springfield. moonless, dark clear sky, tons of stars visible. flat, two lane highway no other vehicles or any kind of lights except one...

2. i was doing about 60 and eventually came to the realization that our car was not yet alongside a bright white light that i estimated to be about one mile ahead, about 50 - 100 feet to my left and about 50 feet above the highway. 

3. at first i thought it was a relay tower and didn't pay any attention to it.

4. i'm guessing 4 - 5 minutes passed after i first noticed the light and then realized it was still about a mile ahead. i began watching intently and after a couple more minutes it still appeared to be a relay tower a mile ahead so i pointed it out to my wife. we watched a few more minutes and nothing changed... same brightness, relative position, etc. suddenly the light shot upward at an angle of approx 50 - 60 degrees at tremendous speed. in about five seconds it appeared to be among the stars. i glanced at the road quickly then looked for it again but all i could see were stars. my wife also lost it among the stars in less than ten seconds.

5. for me, this was the biggest wow moment of my life! all the usual explanations did not apply... stars, planets, meteors, satellites, airplanes, birds, weather balloons, etc. the light was in view for about ten minutes and appeared to be moving at the the same speed as my car for about ten miles.

6. i was especially excited because my father got me interested when he used to talk about a metallic saucer shaped object hovering in the sky one afternoon in phoenix, az. this was during the late 1940's when i was about five. several people watched the object outside a grocery store for at least 20 minutes before we finally left and went home to put the groceries away. 

7. i decided to submit this report after all these years just to beef up mufon's data base. i would also be interested to know of any similar sightings.
content.summary: Bright light traveling at tree top level next to highway for about 10 min suddenly took off at fantastic speed
content.locationName: Very rural area, maybe Jo, Illinois

content.detailedDescription: I have everything videoded of what happened. 22 minutes of footage.
content.summary: While observing left hip was vibrating and uncontrolled crying for 2 hours. this is not first experience of this kind, they seem to be stalking me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a movie, went out side to have a smoke.
when i walked outside to my backyard i looked to the right and i seen a big orb with 3 or more bright lights so bright i could tell where the light exactly emitting from, it made no sound it hovered over some houses before i ran inside to grab my phone. when i went back outside the craft seemed to be a bit dimmer and then seemed to come closer to me before i was able to turn my phone on and snap a video it flew off behind the trees and it was gone
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen orbs floating in newmarket ontario

content.detailedDescription: En la noche del martes 11 septiembre 2001 aproximadamente 10 pm, varias personas nos encontrábamos alojados en una vivienda de la localidad de chirimena, estado miranda, venezuela. una de ellas nos llama para observar al cielo y nos muestra que sobre nuestras cabezas se observa un circulo oscuro, inmóvil, silencioso que a través de si no se podían visualizar las estrellas. lo observamos por varios minutos,nos retiramos y  cuando regresamos ya no se encontraba.
content.summary: Objeto circular, oscuro, inmovil sobre nuestras cabezas, solo se observaban estrellas fuera de su periferia

content.detailedDescription:
Just after dinner on the 17th of april, 2012, i went into the back yard to work on the pool.  it was still daylight, around 6:30 p.M.  my back porch faces east, and although we are just north of tampa, we have watched shuttle launches across the state a canaveral from there.

as i opened the screen door to walk out to the backyard i saw a fireball in the sky a bit south of where we have seen the launches.  there was no noise.  at first i thought it might be a rocket gone bad although i hadn't heard of any launches scheduled for that time.

i have seen the video someone posted of this same event, glad he caught it (mufon case#37553), although it seemed to me that the flight path was more south/southeast than north as he reported.

the object was very far off: approx. 150 miles from us and must have been many miles up.  however, it wasn't following any of the familiar flight paths of the planes we see daily.  it also looked to be far larger than a plane since we only see contrails of planes flying that far east of us.  we don't really see the shuttle itself, just the fire of the rocket and its trail.  this was clearly a big, flaming object hurtling across the sky

i called my two boys out to confirm what i was seeing, they're younger and have better eyes.  they both confirmed it was a fireball, they claimed to be able to see it flaming.  they both insisted if was not a plane.  it was a flaming ball like object with a tail of fire leaving a single, irregular smoke trail, not the straight parallel lines of a jet.

it was never reported about on the news or in any meteor reports.  i just now came across the other person's video of this on youtube and thought i confirm his sighting.
content.summary: Fireball in sky over eastern florida

content.detailedDescription:
When: i was 11 or 12 years old. it was probably spring or fall, but definitely not winter.  during the night, possibly nearing dawn, but definitely still very dark out.

where: in the middle of the meathow valley in washington state between the cities of winthrop and twisp. it is a medium size valley surrounded by hills with a river running down the length of it. the occurrence took place in a large field next to the river. there was a dilapidated and falling down house or barn in the field. there was also our horse enclosure.

what: i awoke in my night gown in the field. i remember wondering what i was doing there. i don't sleep walk. i saw light by the dilapidated building (above, behind or next to - i don't know which. it might have pulsated.) there were figures there. i think they were humanoid. most of them were small (my size) , some may have been taller - short adult size. i had a mixed reaction to this: curiosity, bewilderment, peace and fear. i believe my brother was there - but closer to them then i. i also recall that something was wrong with my nightgown, but i don't remember what.

i recalled this on my own, not in a dream, nor via hypnosis.
i eventually pushed my curiosity and awareness of the entities from my mind and proceeded back to my home.
content.summary: Woke up standing in field in the middle of the night - saw entities & light

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my mother were sitting on her porch talking last night, and i started watching what i though was a helicopter at first in the distance. i then noticed it started bouncing up and down and i interrupted my mom and made her watch with me. we both then witnessed it change direction from w to e abruptly and then stop and hover. while the object was stationary in the sky, it began to pulsate light! bright! like we were scared there was an explosion it got so big and bright! then it got pretty dim and looked as though it either landed or at least came close to, we couldn't see what it did over the trees. then, all of the sudden, it shot up into the sky and was gone! it was crazy!!! and we both saw it!!! it was amazing, we both agree, it was not anything from around here!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ball of light that bounced above the horizon, got brighter & dimmer, back and forth, stationary glowing, down, then shot out of sight above

content.detailedDescription:
I was bringing my dog for an early morning walk. i am a keen photographer and so had my camera with me. i am annoyed by the "chemtrails" left by planes and sometimes take photographs which i subsequently post on some facebook pages.

this particular morning i observed a plane spraying a trail with another plane following directly behind it, apparently within the trail. i photographed this. a check on flightradar24 later revealed the planes to have been within a kilometer of each other which is something that i have never observed before and which i believe to be against aviation protocol.

anyway, i continued my walk. when i see "chemtrails" i am prone to looking up at them and muttering about them. the dog is well used to this, i think!

when i was returning back up the road on which i live at approximately 07.45, i was doing my customary grumping and glancing up again at the "chemtrail" which had been left by the two planes i saw a glint of light. the sun was to the east and still quite low in the sky and it appears that the glint could have been sunlight reflecting off of the object.

i switched my camera to video mode and captured brief footage of an object emerge from the "chemtrail", make and abrupt turn in a (i think) a north westerly direction and accelerate away at a sped much faster that at which the planes i had observed earlier were travelling. it was literally over in seconds.

i have to say that what i saw disturbed me quite a bit. it was some hours before i could bring myself to look at the footage, let alone download it to my computer. even after i had done that, it was still some time before i could show it to or discuss it with anyone.

encouraged by the knowledge that other people have observed similar pheonomena, i have posted the video footage on a couple of "chemtrail" facebook pages.

i know that the fact that i saw something that i can't explain doesn't necessarily mean that it is automatically of extra terrestrial origin. that said, i saw something that i cannot identify or explain.

i have attached a photograph of the two planes to give an idea of scale and video footage of the planes and the object.
content.summary: Apparently spherical object that emerged from a "chemtrail", turned and accelerated away

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a pic of the sky and cloud formation just before sunset. i was facing long island sound- thogs neck bridge to the left of the pic and fort totten park to the right.
after taking the pic, i noticed the sphere towards the center of the pic. at first, when i looked at the pic i thought it was the moon, but when my friend and i looked back at the sky we didn't see anything. we searched the sky and thought it may have gone behind a cloud. 

later that night i saw the moon in the southern part of the sky and it was crescent not full. i thought this might be a lens flare, but it looked pretty solid on the pic and i have never had issues with a lens flare before, so i'm not sure and would really just like an explanation.
content.summary: Did not see object. taking picture of sky near sunset. appeared on pic taken with iphone 4

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1:30am on sept 22,2015. i was helping my neighbor look for his missing cat. as we stood on the road in our heavily wooded area discussing the cat, the sky lite up with an incredibly bright, bluish/white light. it was bright enough that it illuminated the entire area(woods, road, lake) and reflected off of the windows and chrome of my vehicle. immediately after the 1-2 second flash, we both looked at each other anticipating a boom or explosion, similar to a blown power transformer, but there was no sound. 
this may seem very uneventful, but the intensity and clarity was immense.
content.summary: Extremely bright light, flashed overhead illuminating the entire area for 1-2 seconds. the light was bright enough that it relflected off of the parked vehicles.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i deliver newspapers early in the morning in hampden and winterport.  i was in the passenger seat when i noticed a light in the sky larger and brighter than the rest.  it also moved up the sky the later it got.  it was the last object visible in the sky and eventually fades out.  the next morning we looked for it again in the same position in the sky.  it didn't appear until roughly 3:30 am.  that morning there were smaller lights in the sky also moving quickly towards the light.  they changed directions quickly in patterns that planes don't move.  we've observed the large light come into the sky between 3:30 and 4:30 almost every morning since.  we eventually started bringing our camera and taking pictures before the light would show and after.  regular stars, such as orion's belt, didn't show up on our camera but the light did.  we were mezmorized and had a hard time taking our attention off the object.
content.summary: Light appears in sky at approximately same time every morning during early morning paper route

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i deliver newspapers early in the morning in hampden and winterport.  i was in the passenger seat when i noticed a light in the sky larger and brighter than the rest.  it also moved up the sky the later it got.  it was the last object visible in the sky and eventually fades out.  the next morning we looked for it again in the same position in the sky.  it didn't appear until roughly 3:30 am.  that morning there were smaller lights in the sky also moving quickly towards the light.  they changed directions quickly in patterns that planes don't move.  we've observed the large light come into the sky between 3:30 and 4:30 almost every morning since.  we eventually started bringing our camera and taking pictures before the light would show and after.  regular stars, such as orion's belt, didn't show up on our camera but the light did.  we were mezmorized and had a hard time taking our attention off the object.
content.summary: Light appears in sky at approximately same time every morning during early morning paper route

content.detailedDescription: One cold night in january of 1981,my friend ed (name will be given to site but not full name here),and i decided to go look for wild marijuana plants se of town.We were stone sober and looking for a high,to be honest,and invited his friend (we'll call dave) to come along. we went to a farm area south east of la porte,indiana where hemp was grown during ww2.He said this land we would search pot for was a potato farm. we arrived at a side road adter 1:00 am in the dark ,star filled sky. there was about 1 or 2 inches of frozen snow on the field that had been ploughed under for winter. we walked and stumbled across the uneven frozen ground ,crunching the snow as we walked.Dave stayed with the car. we each had a flashlight to search the ground. we came to a small rise ,a hillock of sorts,where weeds were blowing in the cold breeze, shined our flashlights around there, but found nothing. after about 10 minutes of looking we decided that winds and cold had ended the search and started walking back to the car ,and dave. i started to run since my jean jacket wasn't keeping me warm. i suddenly bumped into something at knee height. i turned on my flashlight and there right in front of me and looking up with big eyes where two small deer. they didn't run off as we approached. the deer looked away from my face and back toward where we had just come from.I looked too. to ed's and my amazement there was a column beam of pure white light shining down and illuminating the weeds where we had just left! the deer and us were temporarily transfixed on the sight until i heard the small deer trot away from us ,with the snow crunching under their tiny hoofs.I asked ed,"ed..What do you see?" he replied," one bright light beam shining down where we were!" we clicked off our flashlights and ran at full speed back to the car! it was very scary to see a light beam from nowhere and shining so brightly in a potato field of all places. the light beam was about 150 feet from us,about 80 foot in height with no visible craft or noise involved.It never wavered and was straight sided from the top to the bottom at vegetation. it will always be a mystery to me and ed about what carried or shined that light beam down as if it was searching for us or the deer.
content.summary: I bright white light beam from nowhere shown down

content.detailedDescription:
Returning home, i observed glowing lights coming from the river in the southeast and passing overhead. it was a quiet night, and i heard no sounds from the lights. i am familiar with helicopters and jets in the area, and this group of lights did not resemble either and were silent. 
there seemed to be many sets of 3 lights that came from the southeast and flew overhead to the northwest across the river to downtown st paul area. 


i have video, but the video doesn't do justice to the size and color i observed. 

earlier this week, the news reported that the b2 stealth bombers would be training over the twin cities and i am convinced that is is a likely explanation of what i observed.
content.summary: Several sets of triangles of light, following each other 10-20 lights.

content.detailedDescription: This sighting (1 of 2 in my lifetime) occurred when my wife and i lived on georgia ave. along the dunes of lake michigan,in michigan city,indiana. the year was 1977 and it was late summer(about august 28th). we always took our black lab,kahlua, for her evening walk to the dunes before bedtime.We simply cross the street and enter the dune trail where she roams the sand to do her thing. it was about 10:00 pm that night when i took kahlua on her leash,across the street and let her off it. she did not run into the dunes like normal. she stood at my side with one front leg up,tail straight out,and the hair on her back stood up. she was pointing toward the beach opening of the dune trail we stood at. this was odd because i had never seen her do this stance since the day we brought her back from california, the year before.She was a well trained and very good behaved dog. i looked to the path end and saw a shimmering glow coming from around the end dune. i thought it was our neighbors whom often built a bonfire and drank beer on the beach when it was deserted.(this isn't permitted now ..But happened often back in the 70s.) i put kahlua back on her leash and we ran to the beach opening,expecting to see some friends and neighbors. it was deserted and no light was nearby. i looked left (west) toward the lake pier, and was amazed to see 3 spheres moving our way just above the gently rolling waves on the sand.There was a breeze blowing in my face off the lake (north). i looked down at kahlua and she was watching the approaching spheres to our left. the hair on my arms stood up and i noticed by feeling that kahluas back hairs were still up.It was eerie as the 3 spheres approached our spot and they were clearly visible. they slowly moved in an echelon formation (like jets do) and they were just above the waves on the shore sand. i could see the foam of the water being illuminated by the light the spheres gave off. it was similar to a fluorescent bulb light type of glow.The surfaces of the orbs were yellow glow with small fingers of pink or orange lightning running around the entire globes.They reminded me of those science class balls that create static electricity.The glowing orbs were about 3 feet across and the same distance apart from each other as they traveled.They slowly moved past us about as fast as a person can walk.All was quiet except for the breeze blowing past my ears.I looked down and kahlua was watching them go to our right.We were about 100 to 110 feet from the crafts / shoreline when they passed us.They continued east following the shoreline ,becoming one light source due to distance, until they disappeared in the far distance. i then ran back home with kahlua and told my wife what happened.I asked her how long i had been gone and she said about 15 - 20 minutes. i called the police in michigan city the next morning and they laughed and said it was probably airplane lights and hung up. i guarantee that this was no airplane lights or airplane. that is my first encounter and i will send you another here,my second and last sighting.
content.summary: Three glowing ,static charged surface craft moving west to east along the lake michigan shore about 100 feet from me.

content.detailedDescription:
Large light in night sky, much larger and closer than any star and stationery.   close enough to be to appear unusual… not a plane or helicopter… but multi-sided light.   took video and stills but camera not good enough to do it justice.

i was driving to the post office in town, on the way home i noticed it in the sky because it was far to big to be a start and too close to be a plane and completely still and silent… so not a plane or helicopter.

i was overwhelmed, curious and wanted to report it right away.  i asked a guy in the street; he looked up but was unimpressed, kept walking.

i did not loose sight of it… it is still up there but my  neck is getting tired!  

hope others see / saw it.
content.summary: Large light in dark night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in cambridge england, uk. i was walking my girlfriend home.
as we got close to her house i could clearly see the object hovering above the near by small airport. having an interest is space, space travel and ufos, i guessed it was a ufo. it was hovering and there was no sound. we watched it for about 5  minuets before it moved away at great speed.
it was a cigar shaped object, orange in color. it hovered before moving away.
i felt quite excited bu it, my girl friend was frightened by it as was my friend who was with us, so much so that a had to go home with him as he was to frightened to go alone. i lost sight of it when it moved away
content.summary: Hovered oner a house then moved of at great speed

content.detailedDescription: Spinning orbital globe. appears  out of  nowwhere.  eject ed something ..I was  on the  roof.
content.summary: Spinning  open portal green yellow

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and heard a commercial airliner heading by and abbi looked to the west of my location i noticed a very bright white light traveling at an extremely high rate of speed from west to east. i had an led flashlight on me so i began flashing "sos" in morse code at it and as it came almost directly over head it began to slow and came to a complete stop. at that time it began to dim in brightness, almost flashing but had no real discernible pattern to it. at this point i continued to flash the "sos" signal to it and it began to move again in a east bound path, after about two seconds it made an abrupt 90°turn toward the south and then immediately made another 90° turn to head back to the east. during this time there was a commercial airliner to the east of me heading in an e-se direction . i know this was a commercial jet from the size, sound, and marker lights it had. the unidentified craft made zero noise and had no marker lights at all on it. i have lived near major international airports, military bases and even local airports so i know what just about anything that fly's looks and sounds like, including ultra-lights,cessna,helicopters of all kinds including black hawks and chinooks, hot air balloons, f14's, c130's and so on. this craft was none of these. judging by the altitude of the commercial airliner i saw i can day that it was most definitely at a lower altitude by atleast half, so maybe 10,000'-15,000' . this is not the first time i and others in my family have seen this object in the past few nights. thank you for taking the time to check this out, without organizations and people like you we will never be able to find out what all this is about.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object moved until i signaled "sos" with led light, paused and then made abrubt turn and continued on

content.detailedDescription:
2 very big deep dish plates take 1 turn it over and place on top 
of  the other in dull grey  it was dark but light pollution helped see it better but scary but real
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Spent a night out with friends no drink involed at there house and got a call out daughter was awake travels home by the park  i seemed to see a dark shadowed  object in the sky over the park i got my girlfrind to pull in  she seen it to

content.detailedDescription:
Ii was home, my camera caught two shots of an object that appears and disappears in frame.
i shot the time-lapse at 3 seconds apart. it appears in one shot but doesn't appear in previous or after shots. shot#1985-nothing, #1986-has object and #1987 has no object showing. same with object in shot #2021, which has moved a little to the left.
i only saw them when i put the movie together.
i first thought it was glare, but after fiddling with the light balance, it really looked like a solid object.
it just moved a little in between 1986-2021 photos.
feelings? curious, very curious.
content.summary: It appeared twice in my series of 1300 time-lapse night photos, where several normal aircraft land earlier too at visible airport..

content.detailedDescription: This event happened during an usually rainy night in santa fe, about a quarter mile from my position. at the time i was outdoors standing on my porch.  what initially caught my eye was apparently quick, short movement in the nearby clouds.  at first i wasn't sure if i had seen anything or not, but when i looked away i saw quick sudden movement of lights within the clouds again.  i've lived at this particular location for seven years, and i've never seen quick darting lights in the clouds like this. as i retrained my eyes again on the light, it appeared to dark straight up through the clouds.   there was absolutely no sound, and i was unable to distinguish a particular shape.
content.summary: Fast moving a darting lights were spotted in the clouds, without sound or noise.

content.detailedDescription:
Merged onto highway 40 from rigaud, quebec travelling eastbound towards vaudreuil dorion at about 6:40pm. still daylight.  noticed a single large star-like globe of silver light ahead in stationary position. at first thought it was plane, until 2 planes flew at higher altitudes in the distance.  comparitively, globe of light did not resemble lights from a plane.  accelerated my speed to get closer to get a better view.  object then completely vanished/disappeared.  i noted both planes in distance were still present, continuing to fly in opposite directions.  
entire sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds.
i'm wondering if anyone else travelling in that direction on highway 40 sighted the same object this evening?
content.summary: Big bright ball of light, star like appearance.  at first thought it was a plane, until 2 planes flew by in the distance.  i was able to make a comparison and i realized it was a silver orb of light.   disappeared suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: we were driving on midway drive going towards sellers town rd on our way to work. when we saw just above the tree tops a long diagnal line of flashing different color lights. each light was the size of a small car. it was just hovering you could'nt miss it! everyone in the car was scared just to see this but then it started shooting what look like white stars from it towards the ground. we lost sight of it as my daughter speeded up to get away from it. one of the girls in the front seat took picture but they didnt take it was to dark and came out blurry. i myself was not scared as i have seen a craft as a child in 1973 in the lower hudson valley ny as well as seeing strange things in the sky prior to this incident in the same area.
content.summary: The four of us were on are way to work at 5:10 am when we saw to the right of us a long diagnal line of huge flashing different color lights .

content.detailedDescription: It was pretty late at night when i decided to drive to my mother's house. when i was in my car and nearly reached the intersection down the street, i noticed a string of lights that were slowly moving north slightly above the neighborhood. i could tell the lights were attached to a pitch black, sphere-like object that appeared to be huge. the main feature about the craft was that it was completely silent. no hum, no vibration, no anything. it puzzled me greatly and my head followed the slowly moving, but noiseless, craft even when i slowly steered my car in the opposoite direction. although i was greatly confused, i was deeply curious as to what it was. i dismissed it as some kind of new naval aircraft since i live near the " cradle of naval aviation ". but how could something so huge and flying so close to a residential area produce no sound whatsoever? i lost track of it when i proceeded to my mother's. when i returned home, it was gone.
content.summary: I observed a huge, noisless mass with lights hovering above the neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and in sky above me i seen this and got a few pictures as well
content.summary: Danced around sky

content.detailedDescription: Do to sensitive nature concerning this event and evidence collected please contact as soon as possible please...Cell # provided
content.summary: Giant orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to palma city talking to a friend on the mobile.
it was around 21:30 hours so it was dark
i saw some lights over the road 300 meters apart and i was going in that direction.
i though it could be something the closest restaurant was making to advert people.
once i was closer i realized the were round white lights.
there were 20 or 30.
i couldn't stop in the road until 200 meter after.
i had the feeling the could be souls.
after a minute they went upper not very fast but absolutely silence.
content.summary: 20 or 30 ufos were stopped 50 feet over the road and after 1 or 2 minutes flew direction the mountains / sea
